text: Pedro Ferrándiz González (20 November 1928 – 7 July 2022) was a Spanish basketball coach. He was known for coaching the Real Madrid basketball club in the 1960s and 1970s. He was born in Alicante, Spain. He was honored into the Basketball Hall of Fame in April 2007. He also coached the Spain men's national basketball team for one year, starting in 1964. Ferrándiz died on 7 July 2022 in Alicante at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish basketball players Category:Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame inductees
title: Pedro Ferrándiz
